notes.text:
This update for doxygen fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2016-10245: XSS was possible via insufficient sanitization of the query parameter in templates/html/search_opensearch.php  (bsc#1136364)
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.text: Insufficient sanitization of the query parameter in templates/html/search_opensearch.php could lead to reflected cross-site scripting or iframe injection.
notes.title: Vulnerability description
